MovableObject - Class in GameObject
Defines the common functionality shared by all the objects that can move on the grid.
MovableObject() - Constructor for class GameObject.MovableObject
 
MovableObjectTest - Class in GameObject
 
MovableObjectTest() - Constructor for class GameObject.MovableObjectTest
 
move(Enemy) - Method in class GameObject.ArtificialIntelligence.ArtificialIntelligence
Abstract method implemented by the three levels of intelligence present in the game used to control the movement of the enemy on the grid.
move(Enemy) - Method in class GameObject.ArtificialIntelligence.HighIntelligence
If a chase is not enabled, then the enemy traverses the grid with a 50% of turning at every intersection.
move(Enemy) - Method in class GameObject.ArtificialIntelligence.LowIntelligence
The movement of low intelligence enemies consists of the standard logic inherited from the Artificial Intelligence class.
move(Enemy) - Method in class GameObject.ArtificialIntelligence.MediumIntelligence
 
move() - Method in class GameObject.Enemy
This method moves the enemy based on its type of intelligence (low,medium and high).
move() - Method in class GameObject.MovableObject
Displaces the object on the grid based on the values of the deltaX and the deltaY variables.
moveEnemies(int, int, boolean) - Method in class GameObject.TileMap
Displaces the enemies on the grid, and initiates their artificial intelligence chase mode if the player is at a specified distance.
moveEnemyOnBoard(Enemy) - Method in class GameObject.ArtificialIntelligence.ArtificialIntelligence
Displaced the object in one of the four cardinal directions based on the directionOfMovement attribute
moveVertically() - Method in class GameObject.MovableObject
Displaces the object on the y axis based on the value of the posY variable.
